attributes.long-description:
Get ready for an epic adventure! In this all new story, join Laval the lion and his friends on an action-packed journey as you explore the world of Chima and fight to defeat the power-hungry Cragger to restore justice and the balance of CHI to the land. Laval and his allies will explore the Lion Temple, Eagle Spire, Gorilla Forrest, Croc Swamp and more as they harness the power of CHI to leap, swing, fly and fight through 15 levels of intense action! Discover and unlock more than 60 characters, each with their own unique abilities. Unleash Laval’s powerful roar, glide across the skies with Eris the Eagle, use Gorzan the Gorilla’s super punch, or dig tunnels with Worriz the Wolf! Collect Chi Droplets in order to “CHI-up” and reach secret areas of the game and access hidden collectibles. Can Laval discover the truth behind the legend of the triple-CHI before it’s too late?


1 player(s)
567KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions.
